articles.author: Andrew Osborn
articles.title: Russia removes 'General Armageddon' as air force chief after mutiny-related disappearance - Reuters
articles.description: Russia has removed Sergei Surovikin, nicknamed "General Armageddon", as head of the air force after he vanished from public view during a Wagner mercenary…
articles.content: MOSCOW, Aug 23 (Reuters) - Russia has removed Sergei Surovikin, nicknamed "General Armageddon", as head of the air force after he vanished from public view during a Wagner mercenary mutiny against th… [+4647 chars]
